entry.title: Claremont Cottage
entry.content: Claremont Cottage is a heritage-listed residence at Claremont Crescent, Windsor, New South Wales, an outer suburb of Sydney, Australia. It was built from 1807 to 1822. It was added to the New South Wales State Heritage Register on 2 April 1999.
entry.summary: Claremont Cottage is a heritage-listed residence at Claremont Crescent, Windsor, New South Wales, an outer suburb of Sydney, Australia. It was built from 1807 to 1822. It was added to the New South Wales State Heritage Register on 2 April 1999.

entry.title: Schabziger
entry.content: Schabziger, sérac or sapsago is traditional cheese exclusively produced in the Canton of Glarus in Switzerland. Schabziger is made out of skimmed cow milk and a special kind of herb, blue fenugreek, also called blue melilot.
entry.summary: Schabziger, sérac or sapsago is traditional cheese exclusively produced in the Canton of Glarus in Switzerland. Schabziger is made out of skimmed cow milk and a special kind of herb, blue fenugreek, also called blue melilot.

entry.title: Sharon Township, Michigan
entry.content: Sharon Township is a civil township of Washtenaw County in the U.S. state of Michigan. The population was 1,817 at the 2020 census.
entry.summary: Sharon Township is a civil township of Washtenaw County in the U.S. state of Michigan. The population was 1,817 at the 2020 census.

entry.title: Chotěšov (Plzeň-South District)
entry.content: Chotěšov is a municipality and village in Plzeň-South District in the Plzeň Region of the Czech Republic. It has about 3,000 inhabitants. It is known for the Chotěšov Abbey.
entry.summary: Chotěšov is a municipality and village in Plzeň-South District in the Plzeň Region of the Czech Republic. It has about 3,000 inhabitants. It is known for the Chotěšov Abbey.

entry.title: Hans Karl von Winterfeldt
entry.content: Hans Karl von Winterfeldt, a Prussian general, served in the War of the Polish Succession, the War of Austrian Succession, Frederick the Great’s Silesian wars and the Seven Years’ War. One of Frederick’s trusted confidantes and advisors, he attracted enmity from other courtiers. Frederick entrusted him with considerable autonomy on the general staff, and Winterfeldt developed the first “modern” program of military intelligence gathering. He negotiated the Convention of Westminster and, for his efforts on Frederick’s behalf, received the Order of the Black Eagle and the Order Pour le Mérite. He died from wounds received at Battle of Moys. His name is included on the Equestrian statue of Frederick the Great.
entry.summary: Hans Karl von Winterfeldt, a Prussian general, served in the War of the Polish Succession, the War of Austrian Succession, Frederick the Great’s Silesian wars and the Seven Years’ War. One of Frederick’s trusted confidantes and advisors, he attracted enmity from other courtiers. Frederick entrusted him with considerable autonomy on the general staff, and Winterfeldt developed the first “modern” program of military intelligence gathering. He negotiated the Convention of Westminster and, for his efforts on Frederick’s behalf, received the Order of the Black Eagle and the Order Pour le Mérite. He died from wounds received at Battle of Moys. His name is included on the Equestrian statue of Frederick the Great.

entry.title: Lina Hähnle
entry.content: Emilie Karoline “Lina” Hähnle was a German pioneer of bird conservation. She founded the Swabian league for bird protection in Germany which would later merge into what became the Naturschutzbund Deutschland (NABU).
entry.summary: Emilie Karoline “Lina” Hähnle was a German pioneer of bird conservation. She founded the Swabian league for bird protection in Germany which would later merge into what became the Naturschutzbund Deutschland (NABU).

entry.title: 2017 BYU Cougars men’s volleyball team
entry.content: The 2017 BYU Cougars men’s volleyball team represented Brigham Young University in the 2017 NCAA Division I & II men’s volleyball season. The Cougars, led by second year head coach Shawn Olmstead, played their home games at Smith Fieldhouse. The Cougars were members of the MPSF and were picked to win the MPSF in the preseason poll. They reached the NCAA National Championship for the second year in a row before being swept by Ohio State. The Cougars finished the year ranked #2 in the nation.
entry.summary: The 2017 BYU Cougars men’s volleyball team represented Brigham Young University in the 2017 NCAA Division I & II men’s volleyball season. The Cougars, led by second year head coach Shawn Olmstead, played their home games at Smith Fieldhouse. The Cougars were members of the MPSF and were picked to win the MPSF in the preseason poll. They reached the NCAA National Championship for the second year in a row before being swept by Ohio State. The Cougars finished the year ranked #2 in the nation.

entry.title: Aarne Tarkas
entry.content: Aarne Tarkas was a Finnish film director, screenwriter, producer and actor. Tarkas started his career as a screenwriter for Matti Kassila film Radio tekee murron (1951) for which they shared a Jussi Award. In 1952, he founded a production company Junior-Filmi, which produced internationally recognized Erik Blomberg film Valkoinen peura.
entry.summary: Aarne Tarkas was a Finnish film director, screenwriter, producer and actor. Tarkas started his career as a screenwriter for Matti Kassila film Radio tekee murron (1951) for which they shared a Jussi Award. In 1952, he founded a production company Junior-Filmi, which produced internationally recognized Erik Blomberg film Valkoinen peura.

entry.title: Name Me Lawand
entry.content: Name Me Lawand is a documentary film directed by Edward Lovelace about Lawand Hamad Amin, a deaf boy who moves from Iraq to Derby, who risks deportation from the UK.
entry.summary: Name Me Lawand is a documentary film directed by Edward Lovelace about Lawand Hamad Amin, a deaf boy who moves from Iraq to Derby, who risks deportation from the UK.

entry.title: Colcapirhua
entry.content: Colcapirhua is a town in the Cochabamba Department in central Bolivia. It is the seat of the Colcapirhua Municipality, the fifth municipal section of the Quillacollo Province.
entry.summary: Colcapirhua is a town in the Cochabamba Department in central Bolivia. It is the seat of the Colcapirhua Municipality, the fifth municipal section of the Quillacollo Province.
